io.micronaut.configuration.lettuce

Class DefaultRedisConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.RedisURI
      • io.micronaut.configuration.lettuce.AbstractRedisConfiguration
        • io.micronaut.configuration.lettuce.DefaultRedisConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.lettuce.core.ConnectionPoint, Serializable

    @ConfigurationProperties(value="redis")
 @Primary
 @Requires(property="redis")
public class DefaultRedisConfiguration
extends AbstractRedisConfiguration
    In the case where the redis.uri is not specified use the default configuration.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
